title: Chapter II - Fire Prevention And Safety: Multiple Residences
content:
Chapter II - Fire Prevention And Safety: Multiple Residences

State Regulations

Part 1500 - Fire Alarm Systems In Hotels And Similar Dwellings (§ 1500.1 to 1500.9)

Part 1501 - Fire Detecting Systems In Hotels And Similar Dwellings (§ 1501.1 to 1501.10)

Part 1502 - Watchman's Clock Systems In Hotels And Similar Dwellings (§ 1502.1 to 1502.6)

Part 1503 - Sprinkler Systems In Hotels And Similar Dwellings (§ 1503.1 to 1503.10)

Part 1504 - Sprinkler Systems For Special Locations In Multiple Dwellings (§ 1504.1 to 1504.10)

Part 1505 - Fire Escape Systems (§ 1505.1 to 1505.5)

Part 1506 - Motor Vehicle Storage In New Multiple Dwellings Or Upon The Premises Thereof (§ 1506.1 to 1506.10)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
